short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides drag n drop File sharing and ZoomIn option on Google Meet screen sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Share files easily with other participants via drag n drop interface.
* Files will be saved to your google drive and link is shared with users if you authorise.
* Zoom In option on Google Meet screen sharing.
